Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[The Fate of Atlantis | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — The Fate of Atlantis]]''

MemoryInfobox.description: 'Kassandra's assault on the Fortress of the Three Sisters taught her that bringing chaos to order was the most effective way to destabilize the Persephone|queen and weaken her grip on Elysium.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'The Fate of Atlantis: Fields of Elysium'
MemoryInfobox.location:
Pheraia's Retreat, Elysium
Deukalion's Heritage, Elysium
Minos' Faith, Elysium

General_Description: '''Give 'Em Hades''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra was instructed by Adonis to continue weakening Persephone's control over Elysium. She accomplished this by killing captains and the two remaining Overseers, destroying [[Torch of Hypnos|torches of Hypnos]], and burning resources.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra weakened [[Persephone]]'s control in the regions of [[Pheraia's Retreat]], [[Deukalion's Heritage]], and [[Minos' Faith]].
Section_Trivia: *The name of the memory is a play on the idiom [https://idioms.thefreedictionary.com/give+them+hell "give them hell"].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' – ''[[The Fate of Atlantis: Fields of Elysium]]''
